                    This chunk lists external information sources and database links related to 6-(2-chlorophenyl)-1-methyl-4H-[1,2,4]triazolo[4,3-a][1,4]benzodiazepin-8-amine (including synonyms like 8-Aminoclonazolam and 7-Aminoclonazolam), following the main sections on chemical properties, identifiers, spectra, and patents, and providing direct access to supporting data across FDA, GSRS, Nikkaji, SpectraBase, PubChem, MolGenie, PATENTSCOPE, and NCBI.
